concept.title: What is addition
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is addition.

conbody.p: The term "addition" represents a mathematical operation. Addition is a process, an action that you perform using numbers. Addition allows you to find the sum of two or more numbers.
You use the plus (+) button to express the addition operation in the app.
In the addition process, you take a number and increase it by combining it with another number. That is, we add one number to another.
